title: Smart Data Models - NonlinearShuntCompensator
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A non linear shunt compensator has bank or section admittance values that differs.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be NonlinearShuntCompensator

NonlinearShuntCompensatorPoints.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. All points of the non-linear shunt compensator. Default: 'list'
